channel.title: Need help at jail
channel.description: need help cuz when i ::jail u can teleport how i can fix it? base : delta

item.title: Need help at jail
item.dc:creator: @lord_dharok lord dharok
item.description:
@lord_dharok wrote:

teleblock it that area[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2009, 07:16:45 pm[/size][hr]see here is my jail area

}
if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
String name = command.substring(5);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Staff Member " + playerName + " is jailing "
+ name;
sm("Succesfully jailed " + name);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 2526;
c.teleportToY = 3375;
c.teleblock = true;
c.sm(“You have been sent to jail by a Staff Member!”);
c.sm(“A Staff Member will get you out when they feel you are ready.”);
c.teleblock = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {   

            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("JailLogs.txt", true)); 
            bw.write(
                    "[---" + name + " was jailed by " + playerName
                    + "---]"); 
            bw.newLine(); 
            bw.flush(); 
        } catch (IOException ioe) { 
            ioe.printStackTrace(); 
        } finally { 
            if (bw != null) {
                try { 
                    bw.close(); 
                } catch (IOException ioe2) { 
                    sm("Error jailing user."); 
                }
            } 
        }

see where it says c.teleblock = true;

Read full topic
